019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.examples.login;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.io.StringWriter;
028import java.util.Collections;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Set;
031import java.util.concurrent.Future;
032
033import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
037import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
038import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
039import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
040import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
041import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
042import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
043import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
044import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
045import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsolePrepared;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.OpenModalDialog;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
051
052/**
053 * A conlet for poll administration.
054 */
055public class LoginConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<ConletBaseModel> {
056
057    /**
058     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
059     * 
060     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
061     *            on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
062     *            sends the event to
063     */
064    public LoginConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
065        super(componentChannel);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Register conlet.
070     *
071     * @param event the event
072     * @param channel the channel
073     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
074     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name exception
075     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
076     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
077     */
078    @Handler
079    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleSession channel)
080            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
081            ParseException, IOException {
082        // Add conlet resources to page
083        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
084            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
085                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
086                    type(), "Login-functions.js"))
087                .setScriptType("module"))
088            .addCss(event.renderSupport(), WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
089                "Login-style.css")));
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    protected String generateInstanceId(AddConletRequest event,
094            ConsoleSession session) {
095        return "Singleton";
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Handle web console page loaded.
100     *
101     * @param event the event
102     * @param channel the channel
103     * @throws IOException 
104     * @throws ParseException 
105     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
106     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
107     */
108    @Handler(priority = 1000)
109    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event, ConsoleSession channel)
110            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
111            ParseException, IOException {
112        event.stop();
113        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
114            .getTemplate("Login-dialog.ftl.html");
115        final Map<String, Object> model
116            = fmSessionModel(channel.browserSession());
117        model.put("locale", channel.locale());
118        var bundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
119        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(processTemplate(event, tpl,
120            model)).addOption("title", bundle.getString("title"))
121                .addOption("cancelable", false).addOption("okayLabel", "")
122                .addOption("applyLabel", bundle.getString("Submit")));
123    }
124
125    private Future<String> processTemplate(
126            Event<?> request, Template template,
127            Object dataModel) {
128        return request.processedBy().map(procBy -> procBy.executorService())
129            .orElse(Components.defaultExecutorService()).submit(() -> {
130                StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
131                try {
132                    template.process(dataModel, out);
133                } catch (TemplateException | IOException e) {
134                    throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
135                }
136                return out.toString();
137
138            });
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
143            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId,
144            ConletBaseModel conletState) throws Exception {
145        return Collections.emptySet();
146    }
147
148    @Override
149    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
150            String conletId) throws Exception {
151        return true;
152    }
153
154}
